description.@en: I might not believe in much, but the one thing I do know is that I’m Fortune’s favorite.

system.notes: Every Profession possesses a unique knack, an ability that no other Profession has access to. The Trait immediately follows the Profession’s description.

effect.@en: Whenever you spend a Coin to re-roll a failed Skill Test, you don’t need to roll, as you Critically Succeed instead.
